meaningMnemonic: If you combine <radical>fire</radical> with <radical>violence</radical>, it will <kanji>explode</kanji>! A fire, once full of violence, will surely explode. The fire can’t handle all that violence so the fire just rumbles and shakes and then finally explodes. BOOM!
readingMnemonic: As you watch the fire <kanji>explode</kanji>, you start to <reading>back</reading> (ばく) away. I don’t blame you. You need to back away or else you’ll get caught in the violent explosion. Back away a little more just to be safe.
